Class ContactsApp

java.lang.Object
ContactsApp
Record Components:
contactsList - arraylist is used as a backbone for the contact management
contacts - creates the file for saving contacts into. It will be created in the source directory.
oos - is the objectOutputStream used to write into the file
ois - is the objetInputStream used to read from the file and loads it into the arraylist
lister - is a ListIterator object used to browse through the contactsList
found - is a boolean value used for searching, editing and deleting.
editIndex - is an integer value used to keep track of which index should the editing methods edit. It's found in the select method and exists solely to keep the editing and deleting informed
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class ContactsApp extends Object implements Serializable
Class ContactsApp is the main class used for the functionalities of the app
Author:
Henri Nieminen The public variables include:

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      main method is used for calling methods to activate different functions
      Parameters:
      args - are unused.
      console - is the system console used to handle user inputs
      shutDown - is used to exit the main loop of the program
      userChoice - is used to take the user input for the selection
      Throws:
      Exception - in accordance with the checkFile method to handle runtime exceptions

    • checkFile

      public static void checkFile() throws Exception
      checkFile method is used to check through the saved file
      Parameters:
      contacts - is used here to check the file integrity and to load the contents to the arraylist
      Throws:
      Exception - for runtime exceptions

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile()
      writeToFile method is used in editing and adding a contact
      Parameters:
      oos - is used to write to the file

    • addContact

      public static void addContact()
      addContact is the method for adding contacts
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the created Contact object
      firstName - the first name of the created Contact object
      lastName - the last name of the created Contact object
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the created Contact object
      address - the address of the created Contact object
      email - the email address of the created Contact object
      contactsList - is written here with the new added contact

    • readContact

      public static void readContact()
      readContact method is used to read from the filled arraylist
      Parameters:
      exit - is used to control the loop for displaying the read menu.
      readChoice - is used to control the switch for different options
      lister - is reset to the first index here in order to function properly
      contactsList - is referred in listIterator objects method

    • viewAll

      public static void viewAll()
      viewAll method is used for viewing contacts loaded into the arraylist
      Parameters:
      capacity - is the size taken from the arraylist for contacts. Used to determine if the arraylist is empty or the file is missing completely
      lister - is used here to go through the whole contact arraylist and print contacts out.
      conactsList - is used in conjunction with the listIterator object lister

    • select

      public static void select()
      select method is used for the user to search from the list
      Parameters:
      lister - is used to go through the arraylist
      capacity - is used to check the size of the contactslist as in the viewAll method
      searchName - is used to search for the contact by its first name
      searchInput - is a Contact object that goes through the arraylist
      exit - is used to control the while loop for the console input
      indexTrack - is used to amount the index where the target contact is
      editIndex - indexTrack is then applied to this value

    • deleteContact

      public static void deleteContact()
      deleteContact method is used for the user to delete something from the arraylist and file
      Parameters:
      lister - is reset to the first index of the arraylist
      exit - is used to control the while loop that asks the user which contact to delete
      contactsList - uses the remove method with the editIndex as a parameter

    • editContact

      public static void editContact()
      editContact method is used for editing saved contacts in the arraylist and file
      Parameters:
      exit - used to control the loop for editing
      newId - for inputting a new ID number
      newFirst - for inputting a new first name
      newLast - for inputting a new last name
      newPhone - for inputting a new phone number
      newAddress - for inputting a new address
      newEmail - for inputting a new email address

    • idInput

      public static String idInput(String id)
      idInput is the method for inputting and checking an SSN number for the contact
      Parameters:
      idPattern - is the regex pattern for the ID
      idMatch - is the regex matcher for the ID
      id - is the recieved parameter of the ID
      Returns:
      the method returns the set ID back

    • firstNameInput

      public static String firstNameInput(String first)
      firstNameInput is the method for inputtting and checking the first name for the contact
      Parameters:
      firstNamePattern - is the regex pattern for the first name
      firstNameMatch - is the regex matcher for the first name
      first - is the recieved parameter of the first name
      Returns:
      the method returns the inputted name back
